title: Progressive MXene-based photocatalytic and electrocatalytic sustainable reduction of CO2 to chemicals: comprehensive review and future directions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2535-2569
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00405A, Review Article
Latiful Kabir, Karna Wijaya, Won-Chun Oh
To reverse the impact of CO2, it is necessary not only to curb the dependence on fossil fuels but also develop effective strategies to capture and utilize CO2 in the atmosphere.
